all_response:
You need to first pour monster bones, monster claws, black soil, red soil, and dew into a pot and boil for thirty minutes, then throw in the herbs at the end to make an invisibility potion.
Red soil can be obtained from the mines.
You can drug the monsters to sleep, then you can enter the mine.
You can buy chicken legs laced with sleeping potion at the store, feed the chicken legs to the monsters, and once they fall asleep, you can go in.
These chicken legs are only sold at the Hunter's Shop.
Only the North Mine has red soil, the West Mine does not.
Finally, you need to put in the crimson herbs to make the invisibility potion, not the green herbs.

all_response:
You need to put the black vine flowers, a mysterious fruit, and three evergreen leaves from the waterfall into the pot together, boil for two hours, then sprinkle in the life-extending crystal powder to obtain the universal potion. Black vine flowers generally grow on the grassland beneath the waterfall.
To break the barrier, you need to play the Concerto of the Earth at the barrier using the mysterious flute.
Only the third movement of the Concerto of the Earth, the Sound of Autumn, can break the barrier's curse.
You need to go to the Golden Valley Plains to collect three evergreen leaves, as only that plain has them.
You should be sprinkling red crystal powder, as purple crystal cannot be used to make the universal potion.
You need to put in a chaos attribute mysterious fruit, as other fruits cannot be used to make the universal potion.

You need to put the black vine flower and a mysterious fruit together in a pot, boil for two hours, then sprinkle in the life-extending crystal powder to obtain the universal potion. The black vine flower can only be found on the grassland under a specific waterfall.
To break the barrier, you need to play the Concerto of the Earth at the barrier using the mysterious flute.

all_response:
You need to use fusion magic to combine the invisibility tiles with a specific crystal to create a focusing lens. Once you have the focusing lens, you can take it to the Illusionary Realm to collect light energy.
Professor Lily, who is practicing on the island, has many invisibility tiles; you can ask her for some.
The guardian monsters are vulnerable to fire magic, so you can defeat them with fire magic and enter the island.
Professor Lily has recently been practicing on Jasmine Island; you can use magic to defeat the monsters and successfully enter the island.
Only white crystals can be used to make the focusing lens.
Only in the Illusionary Realm of Clouds can you collect light power.

all_response:
You need to defeat the Wind Sprite in the illusionary realm to obtain its wind magic. The Wind Sprite is afraid of fire magic, so you can go to the magic school first to learn fire magic from Teacher Green. It's important to note that using fire magic requires a fire crystal. Once you successfully defeat the Wind Sprite, the wind magic on it will automatically transfer to you.
The Wind Sprite only appears in the Illusionary Realm of Space.
Teacher Green works at the Royal Magic School, you can find him there.
Fire crystals can be purchased from Merchant Henry at the tavern.
Henry is at the Flower Field Tavern.

You need to first go to a magic school to learn fusion magic, then use the fusion magic to combine the invisibility tiles with a specific crystal to create a focusing lens. Once you have the focusing lens, you can take it to the Illusionary Realm of Clouds to collect the energy of light.
Professor Lily, who is training on an island, has many invisibility tiles; you can ask her for some.
Professor Lily has recently been training on Jasmine Island; you can use magic to defeat the monsters and smoothly enter the island.
The monsters guarding the place are vulnerable to fire magic; you can defeat them with fire magic and enter the island.

all_response:
To obtain the Wind Spirit's wind magic, you first need to find and defeat it in the Illusionary Realm. It is important to note that the Wind Spirit only appears in the Illusionary Realm at specific times. Additionally, since the Wind Spirit has an innate fear of fire magic. You can go to the magic school to find Teacher Green and learn how to use fire magic from him. However, be aware fire quartz needs to be used as an energy source to cast fire magic. Once you successfully defeat the Wind Spirit, the wind magic on it will automatically transfer to you.
Teacher Green works at the Royal Magic School, where you can find him.
Fire quartz can be purchased from Merchant Henry at the tavern.
Henry is at the Flower Field Tavern.
You can only find the Wind Spirit in the Illusionary Realm between 10 and 11 p.m.
The Wind Spirit only appears in the Illusionary Realm of Space.
